item.title: About
item.description: Hi! My name is Dimitrios Giampouris and I am a software engineer in principle, but I’m also interested in computer security, DevOps, privacy and anything that has to do with technology. This blog is my personal online journal about learning new technical skills, but it is also about how I facilitate and improve upon my learning process. Overall, it is intented to be an outlet for the technological facet of my creativity.

item.title: Welcome
item.description: This is my personal website. I will be posting bug bounty write-ups, coding related posts and whatever else I’m curious about at any given time.
